name: Feeding Frenzy (itch) (mjordan)
description:
You are a vampire who is weak and is in need of fresh flesh from the living! you feast upon a group of Templar knights who seek you out only to burn your kind and rid you of the living.  As the vampire you are avoiding all contact with the knights and sneaking upon them for the feasting upon their flesh.  If at all caught by a knight, you will be greeted with fire! Try your hand at playing Feeding Frenzy!

Still in development
